title: 客户端崩溃
author: Sakura_luv
txt_content:
不清楚是不是mod的问题 用任务管理器关mc就这样了
错误报告
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// You should try our sister game, Minceraft!

Time: 18-2-9 下午7:06
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: 下路ADC
replies.txt_content:
Sakura_luv 发表于 2018-2-9 20:40
删掉后启动还是崩溃
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I let you down. Sorry :(
你把mod都删掉了？
还启动不了的话就把versions里forge版本删掉，再把libraries文件夹都删掉(如果有的话)
再把%appdata%/minecraft/libraries文件夹，versions文件夹里所有forge版本删掉
使用hmcl选择原版游戏版本-游戏设置-自动安装-forge，选择最新版本点击安装，安装完成之后启动forge版，等待启动器下载文件
如果感觉慢的话可以在启动器设置-下载源改为bmclapi
--------------
不带mod的forge启动成功之后，重新下载fastcraft(删掉原来mods里的fastcraft-快速工艺)
然后把mod都装回去再试一试

replies.author: 下路ADC
replies.txt_content:
[Thermal Foundation] (【热力基础】ThermalFoundation-1.7.10-1.2.5-115.jar) 
] (【热力膨胀】ThermalExpansion-1.7.10-4.1.4-247.jar) 
删除这两个mod
不想删的话就删除.minecraft文件夹内除了versions，mods，assets(如果有)，libraries(如果有)之外所有其他的文件夹和文件

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
- Optifine replaces most of the render engine to potentially boost fps. FastCraft and Optifine complement each other to a large extent, they are not doing the same thing although the end results may be similar. Be aware that Optifine may cause render glitches with some mods.
这是原帖上的话。不建议把Optifine和Fastcraft放一起。
所以你先拿掉Fasfcraft试试。不行的话Optifine也删了。

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 你Minecraft炸了，删了这个版本重新下载吧。

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 如果重新下载Minecraft的Jar还是不行你就把有关图形显示类的Mod都删了试试
